channel.title: Why wont my cave portal work?

item.title: Why wont my cave portal work?
item.dc:creator: @elitescouter elitescouter
item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

I got this

[code] case 7273: // deatils go here
if(playerLevel[2] >= 85) { //this means you need 85 strength to use the portal
sendMessage(“You teleport to the cave”);//this will display a message to the user
teleportToX = 2480;//coords to barrows
teleportToY = 5174;//coords to barrows
heightLevel = 0;//height
updateRequired = true;
} else {
sendMessage(“You need 85 Strenght to go to the cave !”);//this is a message given tothe person if their str level is below 85
}

	case 2466: // deatils go here
	if(playerLevel[2] >= 85) { //this means you need 85 strength to use the portal

sendMessage(“You teleport back to yanille”);//this will display a message to the user
teleportToX = 2603;//coords to barrows
teleportToY = 3091;//coords to barrows
heightLevel = 0;//height
updateRequired = true;
} else {
sendMessage(“You need 85 Strenght to go to the cave!”);//this is a message given tothe person if their str level is below 85
}[/code]

Does any1 see a reason it wouldnt work???

Read full topic

item.title: Why wont my cave portal work?
item.dc:creator: @Bathus_Dio1 Bathus_Dio
item.description:
@Bathus_Dio1 wrote:

[quote=“elitescouter, post:7, topic:167445”]Ok now that I got that tut, it still doesent work check it out…

break; case 2466: //object id if (objectX == 2602 && objectY == 3091) { //Portal To Cave teleportToX = 2480; teleportToY = 5174; sendMessage("To The Cave!!!"); } if (objectX == 2480 && objectY == 5175) { teleportToX = 2603; teleportToY = 3091; sendMessage("Back to yanille!"); } break;

Errors

client.java:10735: variable objectX might not have been initialized if (objectX == 2602 && objectY == 3091) { //Portal To Cave ^ client.java:10735: variable objectY might not have been initialized if (objectX == 2602 && objectY == 3091) { //Portal To Cave ^ client.java:10740: variable objectY might not have been initialized if (objectX == 2480 && objectY == 5175) { ^ Note: * uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

Well, we are close, but bad news, im not good with varible errors, sorry. I hope that you find help with this.

Read full topic

item.title: Why wont my cave portal work?
item.dc:creator: @elitescouter elitescouter
item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

Ok so I got a portal that goes into a cave under karamja but portal is in yanille.

Is it not possible to go that far or what?

Anyways heres my code, everything compiles but the crap just dont work, not in and not out…

if ((objectID == 2466) && (objectX == 2602) && (objectY == 3091)) { // Portal in yanille if (absY == 3091 && combatLevel >= 100) { teleportToX = 2480; teleportToY = 5175; } else { sendMessage("Level 100+ Only Zone"); } } if ((objectID == 9359) && (objectX == 2479) && (objectY == 5176)) { // Cave Exit to Yanille if (absY == 5175) { teleportToX = 2603; teleportToY = 3091; } }

Read full topic
